name: HeaderFooterBreakTypes
shortdesc: Placement options for header or footer rows.

property.name: IN_ALL_TEXT_COLUMNS
property.shortdesc: Places headers or footers in each text column.

property.name: ONCE_PER_TEXT_FRAME
property.shortdesc: Repeats headers or footers in each text frame.

property.name: ONCE_PER_PAGE
property.shortdesc: Places one instance of headers or footers per page.
